sentences.en: I do not call you a "man", but a "cargo"; I do not call you "murder", but "eradication".
sentences.cn: 我不把你称为“人”，而称为“货物”；我不说把你“谋杀”，而说“根除”。

sentences.en: The unintentional consequence has been to halt the natural eradication of underbrush, now the primary fuel for megafires.
sentences.cn: 意外\的后果是阻止了对灌木丛的天然清理，而它们现在成了超级大火的最主要的燃料。
